attributes.action: Pay annual increases to Xpat. OAPs pensions, same as if living in Uk or EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Using myself as a example, I declared my intentions to the uk pensions dept,nearly four years ago,that I intended to reside in Thailand, this resulted in any future pension increases being stopped, even though I still pay income tax, I make no claims on National health, no free bus passes, no winter allowances etc.etc.
   Inflation here is now making my pension reach a point where I must think about returning to the UK, so that I can claim the extras & what Iv'e lost in annual increases.
   I'm sure that if you had been aware of this situation you would have amended this very harsh ruling, especialy as it's against the very people who helped make Britain great.
